biotools.summary: Immunostainings in Nervous System Development of the Nematode C. elegans | Embryo series courtesy of Einhard Schierenberg | WormBook is a comprehensive, open-access collection of original, peer-reviewed chapters covering topics related to the biology of Caenorhabditis elegans and other nematodes. Wormbook also contains: WormMethods, a collection of protocols for nematode researchers; WormHistory, personal perspectives on C. elegans research; and the Worm Breeder's Gazette, an informal, non-refereed, biannual newsletter for the interchange of ideas and information related to C. elegans and other nematodes. Additional chapters can be found in GENETICS
